Uses of Class
com.azure.storage.common.StorageSharedKeyCredential

  • Packages that use StorageSharedKeyCredential 
    Package Description
    com.azure.storage.blob
    Package containing the classes for BlobServiceClient.
    com.azure.storage.blob.specialized
    Package containing specialized clients for Azure Storage Blobs.
    com.azure.storage.blob.specialized.cryptography  
    com.azure.storage.common
    This package contains generic classes used by Azure Storage services.
    com.azure.storage.common.policy
    Package containing policies used by Azure Storage services.
    com.azure.storage.common.sas
    Package containing sas classes used by Azure Storage services.
    com.azure.storage.file
    This package contains the classes to perform actions on Azure Storage File.
    com.azure.storage.queue
    This package contains the classes to perform actions on Azure Storage Queue.

      Constructors in com.azure.storage.common.policy with parameters of type StorageSharedKeyCredential 
      Constructor and Description
      StorageSharedKeyCredentialPolicy(StorageSharedKeyCredential credential)
      Creates a SharedKey pipeline policy that adds the SharedKey into the request's authorization header.

    • Uses of StorageSharedKeyCredential in com.azure.storage.common.sas

      AccountSasQueryParameters AccountSasSignatureValues.generateSasQueryParameters(StorageSharedKeyCredential storageSharedKeyCredentials)
      Generates a AccountSasQueryParameters object which contains all SAS query parameters needed to make an actual REST request.
